favourite.article: I kept thinking of this song when hearing and reviewing Crystallization of Exodus (2), message 12. Can't wait for the winter training, to see the pattern!

We consecrated this song to the Lord during the 2014 Poland Conference. Each of the verses are parallel to one of the message banners, and what God desires to accomplish on the earth today. Our God desires a house, a home in man's heart, by simply praying "Lord we give ourselves for Your building!" we give Him the ground to work in and through us. Let's allow Him to operate in us by giving Him the FIRST PLACE!
Enjoying with the college students as they reminded us about their enjoyment at the Poland young people's conference singing this to The Lord!

I thank the Lord for this hymn, it reminds me of consecrating myself for the Lord's testimony, "God needs a group of us to turn the age, To fellowship and consecrate, Our prayer is “Lord, we give ourselves to Thee, We’ll be the builders for Your economy.”
